Author: bootload
Content:
'... What about 64bit? There is no Windows 64bit or OS X 64bit version either right now. As I said before it is not a question of 'recompiling' the source code, there is lots of generic non platform specific work which needs to be finished first. We will ship a 64bit version for Windows, OS X Leopard and GNU/Linux. It will happen. When? ...' ~ http://www.kaourantin.net/2006/10/flash-player-9-for-linux-beta-1.html

32 or 64?
